items.sentence: Tom stopped looking for the treasure and went back home.
Tom surprised everybody when he passed his driving test.
Tom suspected that Mary and John were dating each other.
Tom switched to French as soon as Mary entered the room.
You should concentrate on the road when you\'re driving.
There was a limousine waiting for Tom outside the hotel.
There was nothing to do but wait until the next morning.
When was the last time you spoke French to your parents?
Which one of your guitars do you enjoy playing the most?
Who did Tom think was going to drive him to the airport?
